input-field.name: merchantAccount
input-field.label: Merchant account
input-field.helpText: Enter your merchant account identifier. This can be found in your Adyen Customer Area, at the top of the screen you will see [YourCompanyAccount] > [YourMerchantAccount]. Please note that the merchant account is different from the company account; a company account can have one or more merchant accounts. See https://docs.adyen.com/plugins/shopware-6#set-up-shopware

input-field.name: apiKeyLive
input-field.label: API Key for live
input-field.helpText: Enter your live API Key. This can be found in your live Customer Area > Account > API Credentials. See https://docs.adyen.com/plugins/shopware-6#set-up-api-key. For a test environment, this field can be empty.

input-field.name: clientKeyLive
input-field.label: Client Key for live
input-field.helpText: We use your client key to authenticate requests from your payment environment. This can be found in your live Customer Area > Account > API Credentials. See https://docs.adyen.com/plugins/shopware-6#generate-a-client-key for more information. For a test environment, this field can be empty.

input-field.name: liveEndpointUrlPrefix
input-field.label: Live endpoint URL prefix
input-field.helpText: The URL prefix [random]-[company name] from your Adyen live Customer Area > Account > API URLs. For a test environment, this field can be empty.

input-field.name: apiKeyTest
input-field.label: API Key for test
input-field.helpText: Enter your test API Key. This can be found in your test Customer Area > Account > API Credentials. See https://docs.adyen.com/plugins/shopware-6#set-up-api-key For a live environment, this field can be empty.

input-field.name: clientKeyTest
input-field.label: Client Key for test
input-field.helpText: We use your client key to authenticate requests from your payment environment. This can be found in your test Customer Area > Account > API Credentials. See https://docs.adyen.com/plugins/shopware-6#generate-a-client-key for more information. For a live environment, this field can be empty.

input-field.name: notificationUsername
input-field.label: Username for standard webhooks
input-field.helpText: This is the username for basic authentication of your live endpoints. Fill in from your live Adyen Customer Area > Account > Webhooks > Edit or Add. See https://docs.adyen.com/plugins/shopware-6#set-up-notifications. For testing the plugin without notifications, this field can be empty.

input-field.name: notificationPassword
input-field.label: Password for standard webhooks
input-field.helpText: This is the password for basic authentication of your live endpoints. Fill in from your live Adyen Customer Area > Account > Webhooks > Edit or Add. See https://docs.adyen.com/plugins/shopware-6#set-up-notifications. For testing the plugin without notifications, this field can be empty.

input-field.name: hmacTest
input-field.label: HMAC Key for test
input-field.helpText: This is used to authenticate your endpoints. If you want to test the webhook notifications then get your test HMAC Key from your test Adyen Customer Area > Account > Webhooks > Edit or Add. See https://docs.adyen.com/plugins/shopware-6#set-up-notifications. For testing the plugin without notifications, this field can be empty.

input-field.name: hmacLive
input-field.label: HMAC Key for live
input-field.helpText: This is used to authenticate your endpoints. Fill in your live HMAC Key from your live Adyen Customer Area > Account > Webhooks > Edit or Add. See https://docs.adyen.com/plugins/shopware-6#set-up-notifications. For testing the plugin without notifications, this field can be empty.

input-field.name: manualCaptureEnabled
input-field.label: Manual Capture
input-field.helpText: Enable this option if you want to perform the capture of funds manually later. This configuration wonâ€™t affect the capture mode of open invoice payment methods (Klarna, Afterpay Touch, Ratepay, FacilyPay/Oney, Affirm, Clearpay, Zip and PayBright).

input-field.name: autoCaptureOpenInvoice
input-field.label: Use auto capture for open invoice payments
input-field.helpText: Applicable for Klarna, Afterpay Touch, Ratepay, FacilyPay/Oney, Affirm, Clearpay, Zip and PayBright. By default, open invoice methods are set to manual capture. For auto capture, please contact support@adyen.com. After the approval, you can enable this option.

input-field.name: captureOnShipmentEnabled
input-field.label: Capture on shipment for open invoice payments
input-field.helpText: A capture request will be sent to Adyen whenever you make a shipment for an open invoice payment.

component.name: sw-entity-single-select-override
orderState
component.label: Order shipping state for triggering capture
component.helpText: This is the order shipping status that needs to be fulfilled in order to make a capture request to Adyen for open invoice payments.

input-field.name: rescheduleTime
input-field.label: Capture delay for shipment
input-field.helpText: This is the time to wait before trying the next capture in seconds if the shipping state is set and not fulfilled.

input-field.name: refundStrategyGiftcard
input-field.label: Refund strategy for gift cards
input-field.helpText: Only relevant if you accept gift cards on Adyen payments.

option.name: Refund from the first payment first
Refund from the last payment first

input-field.name: deviceFingerprintSnippetId
input-field.label: Device fingerprint snippet id
input-field.helpText: Set the device fingerprint snippet id provided by Ratepay. This value is required for the Ratepay payment methods to be available at checkout.

input-field.name: adyenGivingEnabled
input-field.label: Enable Adyen Giving
input-field.helpText: This enables Adyen Giving and offers the donation form in the order success page.

input-field.name: adyenGivingCharityMerchantAccount
input-field.label: Charity Merchant Account
input-field.helpText: Adyen merchant account for the charity.

input-field.name: adyenGivingCharityName
input-field.label: Charity Name
input-field.helpText: Name of the charity displayed on the Adyen Giving form.

input-field.name: adyenGivingCharityDescription
input-field.label: Charity Description
input-field.helpText: Description of the charity.

input-field.name: adyenGivingCharityWebsite
input-field.label: Charity Website
input-field.helpText: Link to the charity website.

input-field.name: adyenGivingDonationAmounts
input-field.label: Donation Amounts
input-field.helpText: Suggested amounts that the shopper can choose to donate using the order currency, separated by commas.

adyenGivingCharityLogo
component.label: Charity Logo
component.helpText: Logo displayed on the Adyen Giving form.

adyenGivingBackgroundImage
component.label: Background Image
component.helpText: Background image of the Adyen Giving form.

defaultDomainId
